def draw_label(text, point):
    height = 2
    label = rs.AddText(text, point, height)
    return label

def draw_point_marker(point):
    radius = 0.5
    point_marker = rs.AddSphere(point, radius)
    return point_marker

def make_group(guids):
    group = rs.AddGroup()
    rs.AddObjectsToGroup(guids, group)

if __name__ == '__main__':
    draw_lpoint()
